alert.note: Alert for Brookings (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 14 at 8:21PM MDT until further notice by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in South Dakota...Iowa... Big Sioux River at Akron affecting Plymouth and Union Counties. Big Sioux River near Brookings affecting Moody and Brookings Counties. Big Sioux River below Dell Rapids affecting Minnehaha County. Big Sioux River above Hawarden affecting Lincoln, Union and Sioux Counties. Big Sioux River near Trent affecting Moody County. Big Sioux River near Egan affecting Moody County. Big Sioux River near Richland affecting Plymouth and Union Counties. Big Sioux River at Brandon affecting Minnehaha, Lincoln and Lyon Counties. Big Sioux River near Estelline affecting Hamlin and Brookings Counties. Big Sioux River at Sioux Falls I-90 affecting Minnehaha County. Big Sioux River near Bruce affecting Brookings County. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Big Sioux River near Bruce. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 9.5 feet, the right bank overflows flooding agricultural lands for as much as 1/4 mile. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:45 PM CDT Friday the stage was 10.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 7:45 PM CDT Friday was 10.1 feet. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Flood stage is 8.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (unknown time) Location Stg Stg Day/Time d1 d2 d3 Big Sioux River Bruce 8.0 10.0 Fri 7 pm MSG MSG MSG &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued by late Saturday morning.
